desc: Bloccs waterproof Cast and Dressing Covers are reusable & submergible. Durable waterproof arm, leg, elbow and knee sleeves for kids and adults. Enjoy a Shower, a bath or swimming in the pool confidently with a cast protector from Bloccs. Orders are shipped from Sydney, delivered to you at home or on holiday!

layout.text: AVAILABLE IN ADULT AND CHILD SIZES
